EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ REACH Compliance Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
As per your request on information about the DuPont™ REACH Compliance program, we would like to give you the following information in relation to KEVLAR® and NOMEX® product lines:
DuPont has created a corporate REACH website where you will find documents on compliance with REACH regulatory requirements.
http://www.dupont.com/corporate-functions/sustainability/sustainability-commitments/product-stewardship-regulator/articles/reach/customer-documents.html
(If you have issues with the website- go to http://www.dupont.com/corporate-functions/sustainability/sustainability-commitments/product-stewardship-regulator/articles/reach.html)
(To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
The DuPont™ position for KEVLAR® and NOMEX® can be found on the page 'Customer Communications' on the right. Then select under the center section 'Advanced Fibers Systems'.
The bulletin on "Articles" covers Staple, Yarn, Paper, Pulp, Floc, Fabrics, Felt, Laminates, Prepreg and Spunlace, Fibrids and Resins.
The bulletin on "Preparations" covers Engineered Elastomers.
Kind regards
Alexander M. Metzger
DPS-EMEA REACH Compliance Leader
Phone: +41-22-717-5042
Email: reach@dupont.com
